await roleMgr.connect(owner).setRole("0xe9eda7f99ed242c21fbff05cbd3bccf387814fd2", 1);
const roleMgr = await ethers.getContractAt("RoleManager", "0x5FbDB2315678afecb367f032d93F642f64180aa3");
const [owner] = await ethers.getSigners();
await roleMgr.connect(owner).setRole("0xe9eda7f99ed242c21fbff05cbd3bccf387814fd2", 1);
